title: Core AI engine voice unification (voice.ts utility, Reality Lens, IRS, Strategy, Pitch, Chat pipeline)
description: Create lib/fred/voice.ts buildFredVoicePreamble utility. Rewrite system prompts in Reality Lens, IRS, Strategy Generator, and Pitch Analyzer to use Fred Cary identity from fred-brain.ts. Rewrite chat pipeline templates in decide.ts and synthesize.ts with Fred's voice.
